scene: The Shieldbearer stands guard at the entrance, his gaze fixed on the horizon. The low clouds hug the battlements and drums thud beyond the walls while the wind carries grit. As dawn breaks, the air grows warmer and the first light of day begins to illuminate the landscape. The western wall groans under unseen pressure.
